definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: Massive segments or plates of the crust move over the mantle in the process of continental drift.
sentences.chinese: 大陸漂移雕塑了地殼的外觀，使現在大陸形成。

sentences.english: A few writers have suggested that perhaps continental drift causes polar wandering.
sentences.chinese: 一些作家已經提議也許大陸漂移引起兩極漫遊。

sentences.english: The continental drift and the development of the flowering plants.
sentences.chinese: 文章題目大陸漂移與有花植物區系的發展。

sentences.english: Wegener investigated the idea that continents move.
The continental drift theory and sea-floor spreading theory.
The idea that continents broke and drift apart is known as the hypothesis of continental drift .
sentences.chinese: 認爲大陸曾經分裂並漂離的想法叫大陸漂移假說。
